title: Apple faces $862m fine for infringing university’s patent
text:
Apple faces $862m fine for infringing university’s patent 
Published By: CultOfMac.com - Today 
Apple may face $862 million in damages for allegedly infringing on a patent owned by the University of Wisconsin-Madison’s patent troll p...
